mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.`name` as role_name, r.`code` as role_code FROM (`user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.tel = #{phoneNumber} AND u.`password` = #{password}
SELECT u.*, r.`name` as role_name, r.`code` as role_code FROM (`user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.tel = #{phoneNumber}
SELECT r.`code` AS role_code FROM (`user` u LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.id = #{id}
